title: LBJ Memorial Grove on the Potomac: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       To contact the park's Public Information Officer call 703‑289‑2500. January 18, 2013 [updated January 20, 2013] Mount Vernon Trail Open on Inauguration Day The Mount Vernon Trail will be open between Theodore Roosevelt Island and the turn-off for Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial Grove from 5 am to 5 pm on Monday, January 21, 2013. An earlier security plan required that this section of the trail be closed. Bicyclists and pedestrians can get to events on the National Mall from the trail via the 14th Street Bridge or Memorial Bridge.      The Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial Grove on the Potomac is administered by the George Washington Memorial Parkway. For current parkway news, click here.
